LocalVariableName.description:
Description

Checks that local, non-final variable names conform to a specified pattern.
A catch parameter is considered to be a local variable.
LocalVariableName.option:
allowOneCharVarInForLoop, Allow one character variable name in
initialization expressions in FOR loop if one char variable name is prohibited by format regexp., boolean, false
format, Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers., Pattern, "^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"
